name: Beacon
description:
Beacon, an audio/visual NFT inspired by the overwhelming feelings right before becoming a parent.

Hearing the first heartbeat 
Seeing the first image 
Feeling the first kick 
Falling in love

Doing these things all over again once the time comes for your child to enter the world.

The song contains recordings from my own experience that act as sort of a diary. Beacon wouldn't be the song it is without them.
For the visual side, I used an ultrasound image of my son and fed it the individual sounds of the song to create an audio controlled visualiser.
I hope you like it.
 -AA
